properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MZYM_SERVICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM( SELECT SERVICE_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,SERVICE_TITLE ,USER_ID ,TO_CHAR(REGIST_DATE,'YYYY/MM/DD') REGIST_DATE ,SERVICE_CONTENT FROM MZYM_SERVICE sb JOIN SERVICE_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MZYM_MEMBER ON (SERVICE_USER = USER_NO) WHERE sb.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY SERVICE_NO DESC) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO MZYM_SERVICE ( SERVICE_NO, CATEGORY_NO, SERVICE_TITLE, SERVICE_CONTENT, SERVICE_USER ) VALUES ( SEQ_SERVICENO.NEXTVAL ,? ,? ,? ,? )

INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , ATT_NO , ATT_CATEGORY , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , UPLORD_DATE , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTACHMENT.nextval , SEQ_SERVICENO.currval , 'B' , ? , ? , ? , SYSDATE , 'Y' )
